div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 2364 Bougé-Chambalud, 50 km. S of Lyon, 1886 Burial: 3rd-2nd cent. B.C. (Rolland) Contents: 2000 AR. Pot hoard Massalia: ob. Disposition: St.-Germain-en-Laye (part) Blanchet, RN 1891, p. 232; 1896, p. 532; Traité p. 568, no. 123 Allotte de la Fuÿe, Tourdan, pp. 45, 50-1, 53, illus. Rolland, RN 1959-60, p. 39
